section.title: Dynamical creation of a component from Java code
Key attributes and ways of usage
section.para: Portal page can include some instances of the same portlet but clientId of elements should be different for each window. In that case 'namespace' is used for each portlet. The <a4j:portlet> implemets NaimingContainer interface and adds namespace to all componets on a page. All portlet content should be wrapped by <a4j:portlet> for resolving problems mentioned before.
